Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Roadkill
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
A basic medium tank, the Roadkill is a comparatively cheap armoured vehicle suited for short engagements. Very respectfully armoured from frontal attacks, however side attacks can disable movement and the exposed rear-mounted engine makes it vulnerable to flanking.

While other tier 1 vehicles are gas guzzlers, this one burns through fuel at an alarming rate and is extremely slow to repair.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Chemfuel
